title: Man uses AirTags and PowerPoint presentation to ask airline for his lost bags [U]
content:
Since Apple introduced last year, multiple interesting stories related to the item tracker have been shared on the web. This time, a man who lost his luggage during a wedding trip used AirTags and a PowerPoint presentation to ask the airline for his bags.
